Sergi.MVC.Controller

Class ShadowTasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sergi.MVC.Tools
      • Sergi.MVC.Controller.ShadowTasks

  • public class ShadowTasks
extends Tools
    class that implements the mechanism of shadow tasks. Shadow task is the task link that can be given in 5 minutes

        protected boolean containsTask(Task onsetTask)
                        throws ModelException
        Check whether there is a shadow task list or not if there is such a problem, then show it.
        Parameters:
        date - The date by which the task is assigned (the date when the shadow task must be shown)
        Returns:
        shadow task you want to display, or null if there are no problems of shadow
        Throws:
        ModelException - if onsetTask = null.

      • getShadowList

        protected java.util.LinkedList<Task> getShadowList(java.util.Date dueDate)
        Returns the value to which the specified date is mapped, or null if this map contains no mapping for the key.
        Parameters:
        dueDate - the date on which returns a list of shadow tasks
        Returns:
        List of shadow tasks or null, if the problems on this date not found

      • containsTasksByDate

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of shadow tasks that correspond to the date
